argument.name: P
argument.description: A pointer variable containing information about the time settings of a computer.

argument.name: computer
argument.description: Optional. Default = "." (local computer). The name of the computer to analyze.

page.description: The WIN_TIME() function returns information about the Windows time settings of a computer.
page.example: ? win_time() = Day = 23 DayOfWeek = 4 Hour = 17 Milliseconds = Minute = 18 Month = 6 Quarter = 2 Second = 23 WeekInMonth = 4 Year = 2005
page.limitations: Legacy: This function does not work with Windows 98 and Windows ME.
